title: Cancel a Reservation
description: A guest calls to cancel their upcoming reservation.

tasks.description: Find the reservation and review the cancellation policy associated with their booking.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the booking and sees it has a 48-hour cancellation policy.

tasks.description: Determine if the cancellation is within the free cancellation window.
tasks.expected_outcome: The guest is canceling 5 days in advance, so no fee applies.

tasks.description: Cancel the reservation in the PMS and provide the guest with a cancellation number.
tasks.expected_outcome: The reservation is canceled, and the guest receives a confirmation.
